newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spanish foreign minister "serious" in hospital.
newsitem.headline: Spanish foreign minister "serious" in hospital.

text.p: Spanish Foreign Minister Abel Matutes was taken to hospital on Saturday suffering from chest pains and was in serious condition, a hospital statement said.
Matutes, 55, was in intensive care at the hospital on the Spanish Mediterranean island of Ibiza after being admitted in the early hours of the morning, the hospital said.
Local news reports said Matutes had been on Easter vacation.
The hospital said it would issue an update on his condition later in the day.
